name: Gods of the Twilight [DEMO]
description:
Patreon | Twitter| Instagram | Tumblr| Facebook

Uncover forgotten secrets about who and what you truly are in a visual novel inspired by Norse mythology.

Gods of the Twilight places you in a dystopian near-future Earth, where hints of old magic are starting to reemerge in a world of technology. It's a story of adventure, conflict, irreverent humor, and possibly love, in a decaying world waking up to the fact that it’s on the brink of Ragnarök.

Play as two protagonists—one male, one female—whose stories are interwoven, and who each are more than they realize. But what will they do with the truth after they find it?

Intended for audiences 17+ due to language, violence, and sexual themes.

  • Your choices determine the protagonists' relationships with their companions, and with each other.
  • A range of endings is possible, for your characters and for the world.
  • Choose which romances each protagonist will pursue, or choose none at all!
  • An episodic story released over time, where choices carry over between volumes.
  • At least 3 volumes, with over 95,000 words (15 hours of gameplay) currently in the first volume alone.

Writing and Programming by Ashley Micks and Leandro Paternostro Zantedeschi

Character Art and UI by Ashley Micks

Both player characters have romance options of multiple genders, including each other! But the romance arcs are completely optional, and you can enjoy the game’s core story and all endings even if you opt to romance no one.

And more as the story unfolds!

OS: Windows Vista, Mac OS X 10.10, or Linux x86/x86_64

Storage: 409 MB available space

RAM: 128 MB

Processor: 1.7 GHz

Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9, or OpenGL ES 2 compatible card. Or integrated chipset (no dedicated graphics card required).
